headline: Why Analysts See A Changing Story Behind American International Group (AIG) And Its Valuation
summary: For American International Group, the latest change in the stock's price target is less about a single headline and more about a rethinking of the story investors are using to frame the company. Analysts have revisited their assumptions and are updating where they think the stock could reasonably trade based on that refreshed view. In the sections ahead, you will see how this new price target fits into the evolving narrative around AIG and how you can keep on top of these shifts as they...
